name: sails-postgresql-redacted
description: a PostgreSQL adapter for Waterline and Sails.js.  Tracking upstream, but with passwords redacted from error messages
author: Cody Stoltman <particlebanana@gmail.com>

scripts.test:docker: (docker-compose build adapter && docker-compose up --no-start postgres && docker-compose start postgres && sleep 5 && docker-compose run adapter yarn test); docker-compose down
scripts.pretest: nodever=`node -e "console.log('\`node -v\`'[1]);"` && if [ $nodever != "0" ]; then npm run lint; fi
scripts.deps:update:prod: jq -r '.dependencies    | keys | .[]' package.json | sed 's/$/@latest/' | xargs yarn add       && yarn deps:cleanup
scripts.deps:update:dev: jq -r '.devDependencies | keys | .[]' package.json | sed 's/$/@latest/' | xargs yarn add --dev && yarn deps:cleanup
